entries.journal_entry_description: Daevyn Gils has lost an important datapad.  All he remembers is that he was downstairs near the central room and saw crazy droids. Maybe one of them picked it up.
entries.journal_entry_title: Help Daevyn Gils Find His Datapad
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the elevator and take it down to the lower level to get to the Droid Repair Center.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Kill malfunctioning droids in the Droid Repair Center on the lower level until you find the datapad.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Find the Lost Datapad in the Droid Repair Center
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Use the Elevator to return to the main level. Daevyn wants his datapad.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You found the datapad intact! Reutn to Daevyn with the good news.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Return to Daevyn Gils in Hangar Bay 1
